Breadth-First.Explanation: General open-ended observation and systematic clue collection without a hypothesis
Listing architectural and object details broadly to gather clues
Describing environmental and natural features broadly to build context

Depth-First.Explanation: Convergent analysis leading to identification and confirmation of a specific location hypothesis
Depth-First.KeyElement: Distinctive Belle Époque domes and façade matching Casino de Monte-Carlo

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: Shift from broad clue collection to focused verification and confirmation of a single hypothesis
